Quasar:




Quasar's optics lit up when she saw her reflection. The gold of her 
father's markings turned a shade of silver, but the gold was still 
there, slightly. Her optics turned blue. She actually had liked her 
markings. Who did these Energonians think they were messing with her 
body?

"You son of a maintenance bot," she said lowly. Then a second later, 
she snapped. She lept up to her feet, shouting, "You son of a 
maintenance bot!" She kicked at Omnious' face. "Who in the Pit do you 
think you are?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Ominous slamed the screen to the floor in defeat. She was now 
fully aware 
> and it would be more the difficult to break her.
>     "Im Ominous Prime. Commander of the Energonian Empire." He 
sighed, "And i 
> have converted you to one of us. Look." He pointed to an image 
reflector 
> across the room. Her silver body looked back at them.
>     "Impressive, yes?" He smiled.
